raw: Daily Briefing: Edgy markets brace for earnings as oil tumbles .

raw: A collapse in oil prices to levels last seen more than two decades ago has markets on edge on Monday , serving as a potent reminder that there is still a lot of pain to come from the economic fallout of the coronavirus pandemic and raising questions over just how sustainable recent stock market gains might be .
